    • Method Detail

      • distanceFrom

        public abstract double distanceFrom(Behaviour b)
        Determine the distance, in behaviour space, between this Behaviour and the given Behaviour. All distances should be in the range [0, 1].

      • defaultThreshold

        public abstract double defaultThreshold()
        Provide a default/suggested threshold. Should be in the range [0, 1].
